IPC 302.title: Murder
IPC 302.summary: Punishment for murder. Whoever commits murder shall be punished with death or life imprisonment.
steps: Immediately inform the police (Dial 100).
Provide details of the incident, location, and persons involved.
Cooperate during investigation and autopsy.
Hire a lawyer for representation.

IPC 376.title: Rape
IPC 376.summary: Defines and punishes rape. Minimum punishment of 10 years up to life imprisonment.
steps: Go to the nearest police station or hospital.
File an FIR under Section 376.
Undergo a medical examination immediately.
Request for protection if needed.

IPC 354.title: Assault or criminal force to woman with intent to outrage her modesty
IPC 354.summary: Punishment for assault or criminal force to a woman to outrage her modesty.
steps: File FIR at the police station.
Provide details about the incident.
Submit any video/photo or witness statements.
Ask for women officer if you prefer.

IPC 498A.title: Husband or relative of husband of a woman subjecting her to cruelty
IPC 498A.summary: Punishment for cruelty by husband or relatives.
steps: Visit a police station or women's cell.
File FIR under IPC 498A.
Seek protection through Protection Officer or NGO.
Keep evidence like messages, injuries, or audio.

IPC 509.title: Word, gesture or act intended to insult the modesty of a woman
IPC 509.summary: Insulting a woman's modesty by words or gestures is punishable up to 3 years.
steps: Note time and location of the incident.
File complaint under IPC 509 at local police.
Seek protection or complaint via women's helpline.

IPC 323.title: Voluntarily causing hurt
IPC 323.summary: Causing hurt voluntarily is punishable with up to 1 year or fine or both.
steps: File FIR at police station with incident details.
Get medical certificate to prove injury.
Identify and name attacker if possible.

IPC 324.title: Voluntarily causing hurt by dangerous weapons
IPC 324.summary: Causing hurt using dangerous weapons is a serious crime punishable with up to 3 years.
steps: Report immediately to the police.
Seek medical attention and preserve reports.
Provide weapon info or witness data if available.

IPC 379.title: Theft
IPC 379.summary: Punishment for theft with imprisonment up to 3 years or fine or both.
steps: File FIR with details of the stolen item.
Mention location, time, and any suspect.
Share proof (CCTV, receipts, etc.) if available.

IPC 420.title: Cheating and dishonestly inducing delivery of property
IPC 420.summary: Punishment for cheating and fraud. Up to 7 years imprisonment and fine.
steps: File complaint with evidence of cheating.
Submit transaction proof, emails, call logs.
Mention all details about the accused.

IPC 506.title: Punishment for criminal intimidation
IPC 506.summary: Threatening someone with injury or harm is punishable under IPC 506.
steps: Write a complaint mentioning the threat.
Attach screenshots, call recordings, etc.
File FIR at your local police station.
